name: C. You Are So Beautiful
statement:
You are given an array of integers a_1, a_2,
ldots, a_n. Calculate the number of of this array 1
leq l
leq r
leq n, such that: The array b = [a_l, a_{l+1},
ldots, a_r] occurs in the array a as a exactly once. In other words,
there is exactly one way to select a set of indices 1
leq i_1 < i_2 <
ldots < i_{r - l + 1}
leq n, such that b_j = a_{i_j} for all 1
leq j
leq r - l + 1.
